mapper.select:
select v_investigate_task_id, v_project_id, v_village_id, v_address from tbl_investigate_task
v_investigate_task_id = #{investigateTaskId}

select project.v_project_name as projectName, village.v_village_name as villageName, IFNULL(tbl.i_elevator_count, 0) as elevatorCount, dept.v_dept_name as deptName from tbl_investigate_task as tbl join tbl_project as project on tbl.v_project_id = project.v_project_id join tbl_village as village on tbl.v_village_id = village.v_village_id join tbl_sys_dept as dept on project.v_dept_id = dept.v_dept_id where tbl.v_investigate_task_id = #{vInvestigateTaskId, jdbcType=VARCHAR}

select dept.v_dept_name as customerName, village.v_village_name as vVillageName, village.v_longitude as vLongitude, village.v_latitude as vLatitude, village.d_investigate_date as dInvestigateDate, village.v_address as vAddress, project.v_project_name as vProjectName, file.dt_modify_time as uploadTime, IFNULL(tbl.i_elevator_count, 0) as iElevatorCount, tbl.i_status as taskStatus from tbl_investigate_task as tbl left join tbl_pm_file as file on tbl.v_investigate_task_id = file.v_target_id join tbl_project as project on tbl.v_project_id = project.v_project_id join tbl_village as village on tbl.v_village_id = village.v_village_id join tbl_sys_dept as dept on project.v_dept_id = dept.v_dept_id where tbl.v_investigate_task_id = #{vInvestigateTaskId, jdbcType=VARCHAR} limit 0, 1
